properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. 16 METER S/V CRILU, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS ON
   BOARD. UNREPORTED. LAST KNOWN POSITION IN
   47-46S 048-37W ON 10 FEB.
2. SEARCH AND RESCUE OPERATIONS IN AREA BOUND BY
   49-01S 048-23W, 48-47S 045-19W,
   49-51S 045-08W, 50-04S 048-11W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   ARGENTINE NATIONAL SAR AGENCY,
   PHONE: 5429 3248 7150, E-MAIL: ACSM@ARMADA.MIL.AR
   OR MRCC BUENOS AIRES, PHONE: 5411 4317 2300,
   E-MAIL: MRCCBUENOSAIRES@ARA.MIL.AR,
   RCC_BUENOSAIRES.ARA.MIL.AR.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 564/18.
